mil3.3.3:1.2: “bhante nagasena, yam panetam brusi ‘purima koti na pannayati’ti, katama ca sa purima koti”ti?
mil3.3.3:1.3: “Yo kho, maharaja, atito addha, esa purima koti”ti.
mil3.3.3:1.4: “Bhante nagasena, yam panetam brusi ‘purima koti na pannayati’ti, kim pana, bhante, sabbapi purima koti na pannayati”ti?
mil3.3.3:1.7: “Ito pubbe, maharaja, sabbena sabbam sabbatha sabbam avijja nahositi esa purima koti na pannayati, yam ahutva sambhoti, hutva pativigacchati, esa purima koti pannayati”ti.
mil3.3.3:2.1: “Bhante nagasena, yam ahutva sambhoti, hutva pativigacchati, nanu tam ubhato chinnam attham gacchati”ti?
mil3.3.3:2.2: “Yadi, maharaja, ubhato chinnam attham gacchati, ubhato chinna sakka vaddhetun”ti?
mil3.3.3:2.4: “Naham, bhante, etam pucchami kotito sakka vaddhetun”ti?
mil3.3.3:3.2: Thero tassa rukkhupamam akas, “khandha ca kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa bijani”ti.
